short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays notification when JIRA notification arrives. It will need access to show notification, allow it when request popup appears.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Jira experience with the JIRA Notification Notifier Extension, a powerful tool designed to streamline communication and keep your team informed in real-time. This extension is crafted to provide instant notifications for critical updates, ensuring that no important information slips through the cracks.
